CustomField.description: Defines an email address, in addition to the User who initiated a process, that will be automatically sent email notifications if the process fails. This only applies when Batch Failure Send User Email is Yes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines an email address, in addition to the User who initiated a process, that will be automatically sent email notifications if the process fails. This only applies when Batch Failure Send User Email is Yes.
CustomField.label: Batch Failure Additional Email
